item.title: Basic python crash course - Part 3
item.description: Table of Contents Role of underscore Role of Asterisk Decorators 1. Role of underscore(_) Underscore (_) is a unique character in python. It has special meaning in different situations. Lets see first situation where it automatically stores the value of last expression and can be assign value to another variable. Check below example. 5+4 ## 9 _ ## 9 _ + 9 ## 18 a = _ a ## 18
